website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy fireproof document bag with a deep pocket that almost resembles a briefcase.
pros: Delivers a large capacity of 12" x 15" with 5" in depth, so it's large enough for some laptops or thick books
Certified to withstand heat of up to 2,000°F
Closure is secured with a zipper and a hook-and-loop fabric
cons: Doesn't fold down as flat as some other fireproof document bags

customer_reviews.title: Great size and very happy
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for our vehicle titles and other docs. For fun I set it up next to our fire pit for a while to see how it would do. It held up great. Feel better about keeping our papers safe now.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Turk

customer_reviews.title: GOT TWO ROLOWAYs!!
customer_reviews.text: My friend and I have two types of ROLOWAY bags. They are all very nice. Provides ample space to store important documents. I have to admit I love her larger black one better. You can simply search B07MSFSHWW to find more info this JUMBO bag. But both grey and black types are well-constructed.Recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Vera X.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the important documents
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up in the hopes of making my family a little bit safer. We had been keeping important documents like the house, insurance, etc in a regular metal filing cabinet. With this bag, I can now safely keep the most crucial documents at an arms reach should something come up where we need to be ready to go. As an added bonus, the case has a shoulder strap so I can easily carry it without giving up one of my hands. It is comfortable and not heavy at all with just a collection of documents and hard drives. I should have gotten one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Trickee

customer_reviews.title: Protect your important Documents and Passport!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this Fireproof Doxument Holder today, and was pleasantly surprised by how roomy it actually is. I plan to put all my important papers, Passport, and some Jewelry in there. Maybe also some of my treasured photos. Right now everything is in a different drawer in different parts of the house. In case of Fire, I would waste precious time trying to gather all of them. What a great idea this bag is. I can keep everything all in one place! Not sure how Fireproof it really is, but one thing for sure, it provides more protection than zero protection in a drawer!
customer_reviews.author: Sasashay

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Ripped
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was perfect but it’s not anything proof, as there’s a tear in it. Now to go through the dreadful return process.
customer_reviews.author: CindyYoo

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations, More Peace of Mind with this Case
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this purchase, and it exceeded my expectations for size and quality. I bought a smaller fireproof documents envelope to put in this bag, and it fits perfectly. So I've now stored a couple of photo albums, family movie DVDs, and my family's important documents all in this one case. Glad it's waterproof, too. In the event of an emergency, I have a handy case to pick up and go; in the event a fire when I'm not home, at least there's a better chance now of my pictures and documents surviving.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Parker

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY APPEARS FINE, HOPE NEVER HAVE TO TEST
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't lift my previous safe and it got badly jammed. Getting accustomed to using this type of safe took a bit of adjusting, re-organizing important papers etc. Bought some file folders and did some labeling to make items easier to find. Opening is rather narrow, bag doesn't seem to stand up very well. Most importantly,as many other buyers have stated is the actual effectiveness of protection against fire/water damage should need arise. Noted another buyer's testing process showed VERY POOR RESULTS.
customer_reviews.author: Linny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protecting important papers
customer_reviews.text: We live on 20 acres of forest land. And our biggest threat is a forest fire. Although we have a fire safe, I keep all our important papers together in it so that if we had to evacuate, we can grab the papers and go. When I saw this on Amazon I decided that having a fire and water resistant portfolio to hold all these important papers and cash would be even better than the simple briefcase I had been using. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: FJLTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Better alternative to storage safes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to keep all important documents and money as I believe it is more practical than one if those safes which are so heavy. This is lightweight, you can easily grab it by the handle and go. I like that it has enough room for several file holders which means that all important papers stay organized. Arrived very quickly. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: willbuyagain

customer_reviews.title: This is the must-have accessory going forward my friends!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! Sleek and attractive yet strong enough to defend against water and fire damage. It’s everything we need to protect our most valuable and coveted documents not to mention our Covid protection gear. We can grab the case, accessorize with the shoulder strap and throw it on and head to our private plane at Northeast Regional. I can’t even imagine how many Krugerrand I could stuff in here. My husband wanted me to get something compact yet big enough to keep all of our passports and cash intact, he calls it our "Go Bag"! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: ROLOWAY Fireproof & Waterproof Document Bag
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this product when it arrived. It has enough room to store many documents and files. It appears to be well constructed. Hopefully, I will never need to find out if it is truly fireproof or waterproof but it reassuring to have this product. I also liked that it has both a handle to hold on to with your hand and a shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for a day and it hasn’t gone through a fire so there’s no way to know how it’ll hold up. For transparency: I have to review this for some warranty/free gift thing that came in the bag package.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Foster

customer_reviews.title: Zipper too small to insert book, but seller made things right!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: The seller promptly contacted me and, without charge, is sending a larger 17" bag that will fit our bible. Excellent follow-up and service. I'm upgrading my rating to 5 stars. I bought the large 15" wide bag based on its stated dimensions to hold a large family bible. The bag is big enough, but the zipper is too short and does not open wide enough to insert the book. For a full width book the maximum length can only be 10" to get through.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fireproof and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fireproof! Just received it and it fits perfectly for my Mac and notebooks. Great quality. It comes with a strap so you could carry it on your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived and it surpassed my expectations. The size is perfect for my tax returns, mortgage docs and other key documents. I like that the bag has a handle you can attach so that in a fire emergency you could put it on your shoulder and have your hands free. The bag is lighter in weight than the old school safe I was using. You may want to purchase a lock to join the two zipper pieces together, but the items I put in the bag I didn't need to protect in that fashion. I've already order a second bag for my old negatives from pre-digital days.
customer_reviews.author: K. Van

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy bag for keeping important items safe from fire and water yet easily transported!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of the Roloway Fireproof bag as I was so pleased with my first order that I bought one for a friend. It holds a lot of items and fills my need for having my important documents in one place safe from fire and water but also easily transportable if an unexpected emergency should occur. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay Mason

customer_reviews.title: We keep upapers in a safe that  is difficult to open and requires 6 men with good backs to carry
customer_reviews.text: While our safe was built into the house, it is not fireproof. So our marriage license and other vital documents are in danger should the house burn. The safe is pretty full with things like my great-grandfather's watch, and other family mimentos we could not replace. When my husband learned the cost of getting new copies of our birth certificates, he decided we should look for something to protect our special dociments. We can't replace our memories. This product was exactly what we were looking for. We hope to never find out if it works.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: This bag makes adulting easier!
customer_reviews.text: This product saved me hours of paperwork and headaches when my apt recently flooded. It kept everything dry and safe, and it was easy to grab as I evacuated. Everyone needs this bag - or maybe 2 - if you have many document. Get an extra and put other essentials, like extra pairs of contact lenses, any meds you take regularly, some cash, a house key, etc. They make great gifts - something you wouldn’t think to get yourself, but everyone needs and appreciates!
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - exactly as hoped
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a great find, I wanted to save important documents in something safer, but home safes are too heavy for me to handle. I was excited to find this bag and it looks nice and is easy to use. As others have said, the top is a bit restrictive getting larger binders in, but I suppose that is to make it fire/water safe... that is the only thing I wish was different as it makes it harder to use. But if I don't use it daily, that will not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: KarenAZ

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Didn’t realize this existed
customer_reviews.text: I initially started searching for backpacks and found this and I’m glad I did. It looks and feels perfect; with a shoulder strap, it’s easy to carry. Compartment is huge- enough to fit a 13” laptop, some cash, jewelry and passports, important papers etc. It was a lot lighter than I thought, which is also a positive. Upon purchasing, I didn’t realize they had lab tests done on it. My question was who actually knows what sort of heat it can withstand. Now I feel much better about my purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: yorkymark

customer_reviews.title: Good size and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put my file folders into this bag without any issues, and it had plenty of room to spare. Construction seems sturdy. Overall, seems like a solid bag for keeping all of my important stuff safe!
customer_reviews.author: L. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Fireproof bags
customer_reviews.text: I cannot comment on the fire/water proof abilities of these bags as they have not been tested by me. I am using them to keep 3-ring binders protected. They work well if the binders are inserted vertically. I could not fit these binders in horizonatally as the opening is narrower than the bag. The smaller bags work perfectly for storing cash and extra keys. So far, I am happy with these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this both for organization and peace of mind. Going through paperwork after my father's death last year really made the need for that hit home. Relevant paperwork was scattered in various places all around the house, with the most important (birth certificates, vehicle titles, e. t.c) simply placed in a small, flimsy metal box that didn't even latch closed. This has plenty of room for all our paperwork to be kept together and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany P

customer_reviews.title: Not fire safe per local FD
customer_reviews.text: Per my local fire department this would NOT hold up in a bad house fire. Returned, refunded, no problem
customer_reviews.author: Stormy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fireproof safe box for sale cuz this bag is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: My goal is to preserve documents (birth certs, life insurance, passports, etc) so this bag is PERFECT for my OCD. Roomy enough to slide in the Filly Wink 12x9 tabbed document holders without bending them. Everything is organized and easily visible. Emptied my heavy, tiny fireproof safe box into this bag and I have TONS of space left. I'll never have to dump the whole box looking for one document again. And this bag will be so much easier to toss in the car for the next hurricane. All the fam is gonna get one for Christmas. Wish I had known this existed years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Fidget

customer_reviews.title: I actually hope that I never really need
customer_reviews.text: I hope that I never have to test this product but it seems perfect for what I need. I was looking for a fireproof and waterproof case for paperwork that would be hard/impossible to replace. This fits the bill perfectly. It was big enough to store all my documents and still have plenty of room. I love the handle and shoulder strap. That will make it so easy to grab and run in case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: JRG

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product at all
customer_reviews.text: It just flimsy , Stitches and workmen is so bed stitches are Horrible
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine, but.
customer_reviews.text: The bags appear to be of good quality. I think that they probably are fireproof, but it is something that I don't plan to test. But it came with a card that said to activate the warranty and get a free gift (an additional small bag). So I activated the warranty. But they will send you the bag only if you post a 5 star review with pictures. After I exited without doing that, the next day I received an email reminding me to post the 5 star review. So take the 5 star reviews with a grain of salt.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: I want to give it 5 Stars, but I won't know until my house burns down or floods
customer_reviews.text: The case seems well designed and built. Unfortunately (or perhaps fortunately) I don't know if it actually works because my house has not yet burned down or flooded. But I get a good feeling about it. I wish it were a bit more rigid so it would stand upright. Bottom line, I'm glad I bought it. Price was reasonable. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Scott Luther

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!! TOP TIER CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made and looks like it will hold up under it's intended use. Will be using it in home to hold the family's SS cards, passports, and the family's external hard drives that holds photos and videos. More importantly.... I had a question/concern on my order when I rep'd it and the seller reached out to quickly and exceeded my exceptions as far as customer service is concerned. Others may sell similar products but I was very happy with this seller. Rest assured that buying from this seller you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Holds A Lot
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I have not had to test this bag in a fire but the quality of the construction gives me confidence that it would perform as advertised. It really is well made: zipper, material, stitching and binding are all solid and feel strong. Plus it holds way way more than I expected. I fit a drawer full of photographs into just one bag without any bulging or straining against the zipper. I'll probably buy another one for other precious possessions.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking but could have used a ring inside to hang spare keys
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of the silver and the black ribbing (binding) on the edges. The zippered opening at the top could have been an inch wider to allow easier insertion of a standard file 8.5x11. What would be really would be a clip like you have in a knapsack to hold a key ring since I'm using this for important papers and spare keys for important items.
customer_reviews.author: David J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Something You Need...That I Hope You Never Use.
customer_reviews.text: With this bag, your documents should survive a fire, but I doubt it will. (I did not place it in a fire.) That is what this bag is designed to do though, protect your documents. This is not the sort of thing of which to get multiple uses. I would also recommend placing documents in another plastic bag within the fireproof bag. Then it will be waterproof instead of water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Terrell

customer_reviews.title: It's Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully I'll never know if it's fireproof, but I'm quite relieved to have this item My mom passed away recently and I have to keep very important items that are irreplaceable. I'll be filling it immediately! It appears that the quality is excellent. Zipper is very durable looking. It's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Oh So Sparkly

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for many folders filled with documents
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never have to vouch for the fire resistance of the bag, but I do like the size. I was able to put a large folder filled with power of attorney papers in it and several other important letter size documents. There is still room left for many more documents and folders.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The bag is much larger than the picture would suggest. It's about the size of a normal briefcase. The item comes with a shoulder strap for general use, not fire rated. The bag has one zipper across the top which opens to the large pocket that holds all the items. On top of that, there is a velcro strip along the flap just for added protection. I wouldn't subject this to direct heat since it is a coated surface after all. It's the perfect solution for larger document storage you need to access quickly in case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Dee and Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: I use mine to store important documents to take to my tornado room if needed. It is large enough to hold even file folders. It is sturdy and the handle makes it easy to transport. I can’t say how it holds up to fire and water, but I expect it will do well. I use the smaller case for cash and it works well. I can recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: randy painter

customer_reviews.title: good quality but the opening is very narrow
customer_reviews.text: the bag is good quality but unless you can maneuver your materials around-the opening is very narrow
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I’m blown away with this bag, it’s very well made. I bough the bag to carry lithium batteries when I fly but I think Im going to use it every day. The zipper is sealed and with the flap securely closed I don’t believe any water could get it. The outer skin feels a bit like a silicone breaking sheet, I thought about testing the fireproofing but it looks to good to mess with. It does come with a paper report from some kind of testing. I’m not entirely sure what it means but I’d bet it’s something to do with it’s fireproof rating.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: It is a great place for keeping your important things safe and organized.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. It seems really well put together, the seams are reinforced and well made. I have no idea how it would perform if it was actually in a fire, hopefully won't ever have to, but you can tell that it has some kind of treatment on the outside. It isn't just a regular bag, the texture of the outside is almost waxy. This bag definitely was what I expected it to be. As far as organizing your things inside, there aren't any pockets or folders or anything so you have to put something in there if you want something a little more organized but there is a lot of room so that isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but waterproof is questionable.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this BUT I don't see how it can be waterproof unless there talking about rain only. There's a zipper on top that's covered by a flap. If my home threat of tsunami happens this will not be safe from water.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Quail

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Although I recently received the bag and haven't tested the product for fire proof reliability, the bag seems to be sturdy and holds quite a bit of items. I like that it has a zipper for closure and then the top folds over to velcro to the front of the bag. I'm using it as an extra document holder to go along with the fire proof box I have for the items that don't need to be as safe from fire but still important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoy each day

customer_reviews.title: I hope I never have to use this in a real situation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag and was able to fit a decent amount of files in here. I do like there is a zipper to keep everything inside of the bag. It is well made and also comes with a great shoulder strap. I put important documents in here (passports, cash, etc...). I have yet to test this bag in a real situation where fire is present.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is not a briefcase, but more of a satchel. It is not hard, but it doesn't matter. It holds a lot of paper and full legal sized documents. I don't know the level of fire protection that it provides, but it seems to be thick enough to give you adequate protection for a while. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight K. Schrute

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough and doesn't open wide enough for documents
customer_reviews.text: If you have a few sheets of paper, this is good. Otherwise, it's not big enough for all the documents, as in a noteboot, one would expect to fit into this bag. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie R.

customer_reviews.title: Must for hurricane prep!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to prep for hurricane and now a must for us. Just grab and go in case of emergency and keeps all pertinent important docs in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Well made and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that the outside cover is coated so as to protect the user from nasty fiberglass slivers that are often a nuisance factor with other bags. And the fact that its aluminum colored rather than deep black is nice in the event that you have to grab it when the power is out. Think I'll buy one for my con as a holiday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tirjan

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I love this product just for its size. I have 2 smaller fireproof roloways that fit inside of this..(enough for documents,passports,etc cash etc) I don’t have a testament to its durability in a fire..thank god.. But it’s a well made product. I’m going to order another for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: anguilla12

customer_reviews.title: Quality fire proof document bag for family heritage photos
customer_reviews.text: Read many reviews online before deciding to purchase a Roloway document bag. Everything I read affirmed this product would protect my library of family photo books. I was definitely pleased with the product when I received my order. I now just have to figure out the quantity I need to re-order to store my 50 years of family heritage. Thank you Roloway for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a fire/water resistant bag since a safe would be overkill for what we want to protect. This seems perfect. Looks well made and all the documents we wanted to protect fit inside it. We (thankfully) haven't had a chance to test it in action yet, but it seems like it will do the job if we ever do.
customer_reviews.author: Jim from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Old Bible
customer_reviews.text: I have a family heirloom Bible that I wanted to make sure it was preserved. It fit perfectly and I feel it will be safe from dust, dirt, fire and flood.
customer_reviews.author: AlexisC8

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This fireproof bag is sleek and makes for an excellent security bag. All of my valuables fit comfortably inside of the bag and the bag tends to expand to the size needed for the amount of goods stored. Very convenient for storage. It also has an attractive appearance. Love it! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like great quality. Tried to light it on fire with a BBQ lighter, and didn't burn with direct exposure for about 10-15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: thiscaristooslow

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to a metal safe
customer_reviews.text: I got this product in lieu of buying a heavy safe. It seems well made, and I like the shoulder strap. Of course I can’t tell whether the product works without starting a fire, but it seems to be ok. I’m concerned about the gap between the closing flap and the zipper, which seems to be the most vulnerable point.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Word

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and roomy
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bag...reminds me of an insulated pizza box or a lead blanket for an xray, the bags are heavier and bigger than you'd expect but still a good size for storing. Quite pleased with it - these will make nice gifts too.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Fits our 3 ring binder!
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot of reviews on similar items, I chose to go with this hoping our binder with our important documents would fit. It sure did and with a lot of room to spare! It is water resistant. Hoping it’s fire resistant as well (in the worst case scenario). We live in earthquake territory, so I’m glad we have something like this to give our documents extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hold family photos and hopefully protect them if I can't get them out right away...from heat AND water! It is a rubberized fabric with a waterproof zipper and shoulder strap. Bigger than expected. It is a wide and deep pouch! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: James E. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases ever!
customer_reviews.text: i wasn't sure about the Document bag, but I am glad I purchased 1! I used it to store my photos in and it is perfect! I ordered another one to put my photo albums, baby book,year books and my degree. I would highly recommend this product to everyone! Thank you ROLOWAY for protecting my unreplaceable photos!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Consider the size
customer_reviews.text: Trust me and buy the XL version. It’s not as easy to take standard sized papers in/out of this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Product seems well built and fit my binders perfectly. However they try to buy your ratings by offering free product for a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Louis F.

customer_reviews.title: ROLOWAY DOCUMENT BAG IS VERY NICE
customer_reviews.text: This item was perfect for my needs. I had some important legal documents, cash and a few other things that I needed to protect tillI could put them somewhere else for safe seeking. This item is light weight, true to description and great for what it is. I will keep other things in it from now on. For the price and what it does it was perfect. If someone does not want a safe then this is a good alternative. Easy to store somewhere for safe keeping as it is very flat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a very sturdy bag. It is bigger than I thought it would be and will hold more than I needed. I ordered it to hold a 3 hole 12 x 12 binder which holds our living trust documents. The only problem I have now is finding a safe wide enough or deep enough to hold the bag. The small bag is a nice addition for cash.
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I had a huge notebook full of information upon my death. These items would not fit in my safe. This case is great.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag, large enough for very large binder and other paperwork. Like other reviewers, I hope I never have to put it to the fire test!
customer_reviews.author: Mabel11

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems very durable, the material doesn't seem to be irritating. I wish the carrying strap is a bit thicker but it still holds pretty well. I was impressed at the quality of the bag. Holds a good amount of document, I think I have about 2 inch thick of stuff in there, maybe more.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the construction and quality of the material. I am going to order a couple more This is a great company to deal with. They want to make sure you are satisfied with their product. Their response is quick.
customer_reviews.author: M Glass

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made..do wish the opening was a little wider but I made it work Keeping birth certificates...etc important papers and pictures. Things you would hate to loose. This is easy to pick up go with you in case of emergency... I hope none of have to use it that way. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rita A

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Ready to Go!
customer_reviews.text: After a fire swept through our rural community a couple years ago and we only had minutes to evacuate, I realized I needed a bag I could just grab and go. I have my important papers packed in here i.e. insurance papers, passports, marriage certificate, medical info, etc. It gives me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: antonia

customer_reviews.title: This bag appears to be exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say I have not tested the most important features of this product - fire and water resistance. I'm taking the manufacturer at their word on that. Beyond that, I was quite pleased. The bag is roomy, sturdy, and stands nicely on its own. Other reviews complains about the width of the zipper opening but I found it very easy to place files inside the bag. Overall, it suits my needs nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and practical.
customer_reviews.text: 75 yr old female is writing this review, I just ordered these because our current fire safe that was very heavy and I was unable to lift it. I needed something in case of emergency, hopefully I will have to use it in an emergency
customer_reviews.author: JudinSD

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to keep my important papers safe and together. I will order more as needed. It is very durable and holds more than I thought it would. A perfect place to keep wills, passports, insurance policies, titles, deeds, and more. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Leh

customer_reviews.title: Well built and good looking
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks sturdy and well made. I did a quick splash test and it repels water as expected. Have not had a chance to test flame resistance yet. I’m using this bag to hold essentials that I can take in a pinch during emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Jasz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grab & go!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has a shoulder strap as well as the carrying handle. We have had to evacuate from fire danger twice and I like that it is totally 'grab & go'. It zippers as well as having a velcro'd flap to keep any water out and, although I haven't tried the fire resistance part out, it seems very safe.
customer_reviews.author: Marigoldfarms

customer_reviews.title: Durable quality
customer_reviews.text: This case fit all the important papers and folders I wanted to put in it just fine. Haven't been in a fire or flood yet but looks like it is definitely giving my important documents a better chance of survival than the plastic folder I had them in before!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Kiva

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I received my rollaway fireproof document bag. I am very pleased. It is so much easier to deal with than the heavy fireproof boxes that I have used for years. We have to evacuate often due to hurricanes and this will be so much easier to carry with us.
customer_reviews.author: ws

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: We received the bag in a short time frame and packaged well. The size was exactly as advertised and we were impressed with the quality . Had no problem with our documents fitting and am very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: march23jdm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for so many things!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool bag, I knew my safe isnt fireproof so I figured this is a great option, now i have all my most important valuables and family heirlooms in this bag, inside the safe! Great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Codebreaker1003

customer_reviews.title: Great security item!
customer_reviews.text: This Rolowaybag is a great multi-functional security device. In fact, after we bought one - for all of our important documents - we decided that our three children needed to have one for their families. So, we bought three (3) more of these bags! We do not plan to run any fire or water-resistance testing, but we trust the results that were sent to us with the bags. Currently, our Rolowaybag is holding all of our important documents and is hanging inside of our master bedroom closet. We would give this product a 5-Star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Wimer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Large Bag
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a well put together bag. The quality of materials looks very good. Plenty of space for you documents and other valuables. Can't comment on the fireproof rating as I do not plan to intentionally set it on fire but looks to be made of the same materials that my Lipo battery storage/charging bags are made from. I will use this bag to store my important documents within a safe for added protection than just the safe alone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Appears to serve its purpose - liked the discount  price and further 15% discount from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Like the bag CONCEPT so much I ordered 3 , one for me and two adult kids to store valuable documents.(that I no longer wanted to keep for them). Can’t comment on waterproof and fire resistivey - hope it beer gets tested!
customer_reviews.author: thomas f. price

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't take up a lot of space yet we can fit a lot inside it. We had all our important documents in a binder so we just put the whole binder in this bag. We bought one for work documents and liked it enough to buy another for home documents.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin B Young

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a Quality made, did not give it a 5 star rating because of course I don't know now it would hold up in a fire which is of course the purpose. Hopefully I well never find out.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. It fits all my documents and I have plenty of room for more. I feel like I could grab it and go if needed and if I couldn’t I’m hoping my things in there would be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Caf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I like the size. It's perfect for documents in file folders and envelopes without crowding the edges. Outside feels soft. Getting another one for non-replacable very old photos. Getting rid of the heavy box fire safes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and material
customer_reviews.text: The product seems very high quality and after reading great reviews, is the reason I purchased. I hope I will never have to find out its structural integrity, but I'm not going to test it either. The size was perfect for fitting into my home safe.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put paperwork in without bending, very easy to carry around, even stuffed full.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had mine a week, but after receiving the first one I did order a second. They held quite a bit more stuff then i expected the only reason for 4 not 5 stars is because i have only had them a week but they do seem to be very sturdy and durable. Unsure about water proof, but by the feeling of them I would say most likely. Over all very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Erica J.

customer_reviews.title: Spacious bag and durable
customer_reviews.text: I like the product since it holds binders and papers with plenty of space. The Velcro closure is strong so using the handle is very convenient. Small bag is great for checkbooks and cash and credit cards. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Teri LG

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a lot more roomy than what I expected. I think you could easily fit books in it if you wanted to. I haven't filled it yet, but I am certain that it will be more than adequate to store important papers, photos, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie C.

customer_reviews.title: They lied about the free gift... annoying
customer_reviews.text: I received a card inside the box that said “activate your warranty now and get a free gift. It’s a lie. You have to fill out a survey. I don’t survey things that I get on the first day but I do activate warranties. So far it’s no going so well with this product. I hope it works if I ever need it to. 🤞🏻
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Good Sized; well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this a short while. I have put in all the papers and valuables and they fit perfectly. I'm not really sure about water, sturdiness or durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Putxet

customer_reviews.title: Large Fireproof Bag
customer_reviews.text: I needed it for the size (besides the fireproof qualities). Very pleased and impressed with it. I am buying another one for my Trust binder! Very pleased. I hope though that I never need to see how well it protects the documents from fire!
customer_reviews.author: TINA SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction
customer_reviews.text: No way to tell how fireproof and waterproof it is, but it is well constructed with quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: BrianG

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and well made product for securing important legacy papers.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, durability and worksmanship. A better alternative than a safety deposit box. All our important papers are housed in one location for our children upon our death.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Marion R. Thornthwaite

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy!
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't want to purchase a bulky metal box for my important papers and items but that is what I was searching for until I saw a picture of Roloway bag. It fits legal size paper without crumpling and after adding all papers I couldn't believe how much room I still have! Material is sturdy but lightweight and I appreciate the shoulder strap for easy carrying when needed. And the price is excellent especially when comparing to the metal boxes I was originally searching for.
customer_reviews.author: JGR

customer_reviews.title: It looks good
customer_reviews.text: The bag is big enough for my important papers and it look well made and good quality, I dont know about the fireproof and I dont want to know if it works, but you know, it gives you peace of mind to think it will and I hope it will. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Zudy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this security bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the amount of documents etc that the bag holds, and the additional pouches for money and jewelry. Easy to carry if you need to evacuate for a natural disaster.
customer_reviews.author: exLAwoman

customer_reviews.title: Not bag like this is fireproof
customer_reviews.text: This is, I hope, a fire resistant bag, but it is not fireproof. No bag like this is fireproof. I am satisfied with this purchase because it is a good size for documents.
customer_reviews.author: S. SHEA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent overall
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a great storage for papers you want to keep at home and protect from possible fire or water damage. I really like the size and ease of putting documents in it. It has a handy shoulder strap for carrying as well as a carry handle. I liked it so much for some important papers I want to keep handy and not in a safety deposit box that I ordered 2 more. Highly recommend. Much better than the smaller envelope styles if you have multiple documents.
customer_reviews.author: Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to grab in an emergency
customer_reviews.text: Anyone living in a hurricane or flood prone area understands the importance of having valuable documents in a safe and easily transportable container. The fireproof and water resistant bag has a shoulder strap that adds to the convienience. It is large and can hold both documents and other valuables that you either need to keep safe in a storage location or grab in an emergency. I have a heavy metal box now and so glad I upgraded to something lightweight and easy to use and carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amy DeCola

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Well quite honestly I haven't had a fire nor have I had a flood but the reviews were very good so I'm very hopeful that the product will live up to its reputation
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

product_meta.title: ROLOWAY Fireproof Document & Money Bags, Large Fireproof & Water Resistant Bag (16 x 12 x 5 inches), Fireproof Folder Safe Bag for Cash, Valuables & Passport, with Silicone Coating & Zipper Closure
feature_bullets: 【FIRE PROOF & WATER RESISTANT BAG】: With high quality FIBERGLASS, our fireproof document bags can easily stand temperatures as high as 2000°F (SGS TEST: UL94 VTM-0 Certified). Meantime, two SILICONE COATED layers bring great water resistant ability which enables to survive the intense spray of firefighter's hose on full blast. In another words, your valuables are safe in our bags.

【NON-ITCHY SILICONE COATING&EASY TO CARRY BAG】:ROLOWAY fireproof money bags are coated with high tech NON-ITCHY SILICONE on fiberglass cloth.That means, you don't need gloves. With handle & adjustable shoulder strap, Roloway fireproof cash bag is super easy to carry all around.

【EXTRA LARGE CAPACITY & FOLDABLE BAG】: With a XL capacity of expanded dimension: 16" x 12"x 5", you can put ANY VALUABLES in the fireproof folder bag, like cash, jewelry, passports, documents, photos, and even LAPTOP and PAD. Meantime, it simply can be folded to store in the safe box or take to any other places as you wish.

【ZIPPER & HOOK & LOOP CLOSURE】: DOUBLE closure - both ZIPPER and HOOK & LOOP, seams are reinforced and stitched to a tight pattern on every fireproof bag. Plus the strap, all is to keep your precious in absolutely safe condition.

【LIFE TIME CUSTOMER SERVICE】: If you have any issue about fireproof bag, feel free to contact us. We promise to arrange a replacement or money back. No worries at all. Our customer service will always be here to help.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars900 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
